data.text: @people It means he will be supervised by doctors and psychologists every time he is with the kids and he does not have an unrestricted access to the kids as he will only get the kids 8 hours by day for 4 days.
@people It means she got caught & called out. I hope it's strictly enforced. So heartbreaking to hear the conversations of children caught in the middle in these situations.

@preeya22 @people Not just from the lawyer but from what past cases have shown. It sounds like there has been some alienation, and they are laying out specific steps to counteract that and including therapists to help the kids process their emotions and reintegrate into his life
@preeya22 @livefreeJaylee @people the judge blames  jolie for this. parental alienation, jolie is a horrible woman

@preeya22 @people From the article I got the impression the judge believes Angelina is alienating them from Brad, and the therapist is there to help the kids process their feelings as they are reintroduced to him.
@people Their divorce document was published on all sites.. where is so called document which details this?
@people This happens a lot more than you think...
